mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( product_name, product_price, product_amount, product_filename, store_id, created_date ) VALUES ( #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productAmount}, #{productFilename}, #{storeId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_amount, p.product_filename, p.store_id, s.store_name, p.created_date, p.updated_date FROM product p LEFT JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.store_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_amount, p.product_filename, p.store_id, s.store_name, p.created_date, p.updated_date FROM product p LEFT JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.store_id ORDER BY p.created_date DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_amount, p.product_filename, p.store_id, s.store_name, p.created_date, p.updated_date FROM product p LEFT JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.store_id WHERE p.store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY p.created_date DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_amount, p.product_filename, p.store_id, s.store_name, p.created_date, p.updated_date FROM product p LEFT JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.store_id WHERE p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%') ORDER BY p.created_date DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_amount, p.product_filename, p.store_id, s.store_name, p.created_date, p.updated_date FROM product p LEFT JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.store_id WHERE p.product_price BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice} ORDER BY p.product_price ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{productName}, product_price = #{productPrice}, product_amount = #{productAmount}, product_filename = #{productFilename}, updated_date = NOW() WHERE product_id = #{productId}
UPDATE product SET product_amount = #{productAmount}, updated_date = NOW() WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_amount, p.product_filename, p.store_id, s.store_name, p.created_date, p.updated_date FROM product p LEFT JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.store_id WHERE p.product_amount > 0 ORDER BY p.product_amount DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_amount, p.product_filename, p.store_id, s.store_name, p.created_date, p.updated_date FROM product p LEFT JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.store_id WHERE p.product_amount <= #{threshold} AND p.product_amount >= 0 ORDER BY p.product_amount ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE store_id = #{storeId}
